javase01.t01.notebook

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • javase01.t01.notebook.Notebook

  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    The Notebook represents a dynamically expandable notebook, which contains Record.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int DEFAULT_SIZE
      default size for an array of Record
      private int size
      Current size for an array of Record
      private Record[] values
      Inner array, which contains records

    • Constructor Summary

      Notebook() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(java.lang.String s)
      Adds a new string to the end of notebook.
      Record edit(int key, java.lang.String s)
      Edit the notepad item by index.
      private void grow()
      Expands the values by 25%
      Record remove(int key)
      Removes element from a notepad.
      void showAllRecords()
      Displays indexes and notepad records.
      private void shrink()
      Shrinks the values by 25%

    • Method Detail

      • grow

        private void grow()
        Expands the values by 25%

      • shrink

        private void shrink()
        Shrinks the values by 25%

      • append

        public void append(java.lang.String s)
        Adds a new string to the end of notebook. Invoke grow() if the new element does not fit into the notepad.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to be added

      • remove

        public Record remove(int key)
              throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Removes element from a notepad. Invoked shrink(), if half or more than half of the array is free
        Parameters:
        key - index of element
        Returns:
        deleted item
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • edit

        public Record edit(int key,
                   java.lang.String s)
            throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Edit the notepad item by index.
        Parameters:
        key - item's index
        s - new string
        Returns:
        updated item
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • showAllRecords

        public void showAllRecords()
        Displays indexes and notepad records.
